ygData.subject: Re: opt files
ygData.msgSnippet: Keeping in mind that if you delete you .opt files you have to set up all your macros again, and move all your buttons around again. Just FYI ... From: Azor
ygData.messageBody:
Keeping in mind that if you delete you .opt files you have to set up all
your macros again, and move all your buttons around again.

Just FYI


-----Original Message-----
From: Azor <jmaynus@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, July 30, 1999 6:24 AM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] opt files


>From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
>
>For those that didn't see the banner on EQ today, they said if you keep
>getting disconnected while zoning or camping to deleted your *.opt files in
>your EQ dir.
>
>**************************
>Azor
>Lvl 18 Human Cleric of the Rathe
